snippet: Oftentimes, a tournament is won or lost in the hours before the leaders’ first ball is struck, so Sunday could feel like the longest day of the year for the last group to tee off at Chambers Bay Golf Course.
abstract: Players in final group of United States Open golf tournament share how they spend their time before tee off.
lead_paragraph: Oftentimes, a tournament is won or lost in the hours before the leaders’ first ball is struck, so Sunday could feel like the longest day of the year for the last group to tee off at Chambers Bay Golf Course.

headline.main: For U.S. Open’s Leaders, Tuning Out Distractions Is a Challenge
headline.print_headline: On Final Day at Majors, Leaders Tune Out Before Teeing Off

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Chambers Bay Golf Course (University Place, Wash)
